properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 15 at 7:27PM CST until January 18 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Jackson MS
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in
Mississippi...

Tibbee Creek Near Tibbee affecting Clay County

The Flood Warning continues for
The Tibbee Creek Near Tibbee
* until Saturday afternoon.
* At 6:30 PM Wednesday the stage was 23.5 feet and nearly steady.
* Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 23 feet.
* Forecast...The river will slowly rise to a crest near 23.8 feet
on Thursday.
* Impact...At 23.5 feet...Flood water is covering the gravel road
south of West Point that leads to the Tibbee Creek bridge near
Tibbee.
* Impact...At 23 feet...Flooding in low areas on the left bank is
occurring.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive or walk through areas where water covers roadway! The
water may be deeper than it appears. Remember...Turn around, don't
drown!

Please note that forecast crests are based upon rainfall that has
occurred along with forecast rainfall for the next 48 hours.

Additional information is available at:
https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN

The next regularly scheduled update is expected between 8 and 10 AM.

NWSheadline: Flood Warning extended until Saturday afternoon
